thread.section_title: Man Killed In Westwood Shooting – CBS Pittsburgh
thread.title: Man Killed In Westwood Shooting

author: crobinsonkdka
title: Man Killed In Westwood Shooting
text:
PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — A man died after a shooting in Westwood on Wednesday evening.
Around 7 p.m., officers were called to Kiski Way and Bartlow Street.
Upon arrival, they found a man with at least one gunshot wound.
Paramedics transported him to Allegheny General Hospital where he was later pronounced deceased.

This is a developing story, stay with KDKA and KDKA.com for more information.
